name: unobserved
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without anyone watching or noticing: So tiny that they often go unobserved, biting gnats can be only 0.5 mm long.
More examplesFewer examplesNever leave a child unobserved around water, including bathtubs and 5-gallon buckets.I managed to get down the stairs unobserved.Since rape is likely to be an unobserved crime, victims may not have corroborative evidence.Many beautiful and moonless nights have passed unobserved because I was too exhausted to carry a hundred pounds of equipment into the backyard.
